coded_answer.p: I am writing this letter to you because when I went to your Musicalmusical show I had a very bad time.

Firstly when I went to the show it was writingwritten that the startingstart time was 19.30 but it started at quarter past eight. I had waittedwaited for fourtheyforty fiveforty-five minutes. Secondly the stars were going to be DANNY BROOK and TINA TRUELOVE but different people came to the show. It was the first time I was goinghad been to go to a musical show but I guess it will be the last one too. Anyway after the show I felt hungry so I went to the restaurant but it was closed because they were having the inside altered.

And as lastlastly that was the worseworst night I had ever had so I asked for my money back but they wouldn't give me it so I had an argument with the people Whowho worked theirthere but I couldn't get my money back.

Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. Because last year I started smoking and nobody knew that I was smoking but one day as I was smoking at the back of the school some onesomeone came nextup to me and I noticed that it was Pat. She saw me as I was smoking so that wasn't going to be very good. She said that she wouldn't tell it to anyone but I knew she might say it to someone so I always waswas always with her veryevery minute, everevery second. But one day as I was walking home like every night I saw Pat at the front ofin front of our house door talking to my dad. I just knew I couldn'tshouldn't have trusted to her but as I went in the house my dad offeredasked potPat to stay for a meal. I was in a schockshock, thinking why isn't anyone getting angry towith me after? After a while we sat down for dinner and Pat just talktalkedtold my parents that I was smoking and when my family heard they got ever so angry. I couldn't go out of the house for a month so now I know how Pat is and that she can't keep any secrets.
